Params: {2: 'Lee', 3: 'If I analyze the defense with my computing power...', 4: '2'}
{3: "You don't know where you are, except that you are... falling."}
{3: 'Someone pulls you up from behind. It is probably Lucia with her jet pack.'}
{3: 'Liv and Lee have already landed on the ground five meters below you in what they called a "superhero landing" back in the Golden Age.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant! Be ready for landing! My jet pack... can't last much longer!"}
{3: 'Lucia lets go of you one meter above the ground.'}
{3: 'Then, you see Lucia landing next to you.'}
